column1: #Text=When Stacy had been excused , the chair was ready to adjourn .

#Text=On the advice of her attorney , Diana requested that it be on the record that , Anuse , one of the panel members had acted throughout the hearing in a manner prejudicial and threatening to Diana and to her witnesses .
